ChangeResourceGroup.title: ChangeResourceGroup
ChangeResourceGroup.summary: Moves a resource to a different resource group.

DescribeRegions.title: DescribeRegions
DescribeRegions.summary: Queries all regions where Lindorm is available.

GetInstanceIpWhiteList.title: GetInstanceIpWhiteList
GetInstanceIpWhiteList.summary: Retrieves the access whitelist for a Lindorm instance.

GetInstanceSummary.title: GetInstanceSummary
GetInstanceSummary.summary: Retrieves an overview of the Lindorm instances in your account.

GetLindormFsUsedDetail.title: GetLindormFsUsedDetail
GetLindormFsUsedDetail.summary: Retrieves the storage usage details for each storage medium of a specific Lindorm instance.

GetLindormInstance.title: GetLindormInstance
GetLindormInstance.summary: Retrieves the details of a Lindorm instance, including the instance type, billing method, and the virtual private cloud (VPC) in which the instance is deployed.

GetLindormInstanceEngineList.title: GetLindormInstanceEngineList
GetLindormInstanceEngineList.summary: Queries the engine types that a Lindorm instance supports.

GetLindormInstanceList.title: GetLindormInstanceList
GetLindormInstanceList.summary: Retrieves a list of Lindorm instances.

GetLindormV2InstanceDetails.title: GetLindormV2InstanceDetails
GetLindormV2InstanceDetails.summary: Queries the details of a new architecture instance.

GetLindormV2StorageUsage.title: GetLindormV2StorageUsage
GetLindormV2StorageUsage.summary: Retrieves the storage details for each storage medium of a specific Lindorm instance that uses the new architecture.

ListTagResources.title: ListTagResources
ListTagResources.summary: Queries for Lindorm instances and their associated tags.

ModifyInstancePayType.title: ModifyInstancePayType
ModifyInstancePayType.summary: Changes the billing method of a Lindorm instance.

SwitchLSQLV3MySQLService.title: SwitchLSQLV3MySQLService
SwitchLSQLV3MySQLService.summary: Enables or disables the Lindorm protocol that is compatible with MySQL.

TagResources.title: TagResources
TagResources.summary: Attaches tags to one or more Lindorm instances.

UpdateInstanceIpWhiteList.title: UpdateInstanceIpWhiteList
UpdateInstanceIpWhiteList.summary: Sets the access whitelist for a Lindorm instance.

UpdateLindormInstanceAttribute.title: UpdateLindormInstanceAttribute
UpdateLindormInstanceAttribute.summary: Updates the name or deletion protection settings of an instance.

UpdateLindormV2WhiteIpList.title: UpdateLindormV2WhiteIpList
UpdateLindormV2WhiteIpList.summary: Updates the IP whitelist for a LindormV2 instance.

UpgradeLindormInstance.title: UpgradeLindormInstance
UpgradeLindormInstance.summary: Enables cold storage for a Lindorm instance, or changes the node specifications, the number of nodes, or the storage capacity.
